name: Limos' Lair
description:
Collect all the abilities of Limos' Lair inhabitants and free the Lair of its curse. Challenging puzzles, enemies, and traps will be awaiting you on your path, but don't be afraid and follow a mysterious orb of light that will guide you through your journey.

GRAPPLE HOOK MECHANICS

Use your tongue as a grappling hook or a weapon to navigate your path.





POWERS

Consume your enemies to steal their abilities.
Watch your enemies to find out what special powers they possess.

ITEMS

Find useful items on your journey.
Some of them will help you fight enemies and some will allow you to access previously unavailable areas.

OPEN WORLD

You can explore new areas in any order you like.





GAME FEATURES

  • Consume enemies to gain their abilities.
  • Use your frog-like tongue as a grappling hook or as a weapon.
  • Explore the world, unlock new paths and solve puzzles by using different acquired powers.
  • Find secrets and complete challenges.
